Bulb for JIRA
  • Documentation
Bulb for JIRA
A simple way to bring more transparency on your test automation.

About

Bulb for JIRA is a JIRA plugin displaying list of automated tests along with JIRA issues they are referenced to.

Together with plugins for build tools exporting test reports compatible with the plugin it gives a nice way how to make your automated testing transparent to every team member.
